title: Hundreds sign petition against rebuilding plan for Moccasin Bend Mental Health Institute | Must See Videos | local3news.com
text: [] Hundreds sign petition against rebuilding plan for Moccasin Bend Mental Health Institute - - Updated The plan right now is for the facility to be built in the same spot as the existing institute, which will add about 200 additional beds to the hospital. As featured on The plan right now is for the facility to be built in the same spot as the existing institute, which will add about 200 additional beds to the hospital.
